channel.title: Refined Power bug
channel.description: When I use this mod, my nuclear power plants don't working correctly. They don't consume water nor nuclear fuel rods and don't produce nuclear waste.

item.title: Refined Power bug
item.dc:creator: @I_m_a_chicken29 Im A Chicken29
item.description:
@I_m_a_chicken29 wrote:

Power plants only use fuel/water if there is a need for power, if you have refined power buildings they are providing power to the point of other generators not having a need to consume items to make power. It’s a vanilla thing btw, not modded

Read full topic

item.title: Refined Power bug

item.description:
@Ano_Kius wrote:

When I use this mod, my nuclear power plants don’t working correctly. They don’t consume water nor nuclear fuel rods and don’t produce nuclear waste.
